meanings.definition: The act of digging up something that has been buried, especially a dead body.
meanings.sent1: The disinterment of the ancient artifacts amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The disinterment of the coffin was done carefully by the forensic team.
meanings.sent3: During the disinterment, the gravedigger found unexpected treasure buried with the body.
meanings.sent4: The disinterment of old memories brought back a flood of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The disinterment of the time capsule revealed letters from the past.

meanings.definition: The process of uncovering or revealing something that was previously hidden or forgotten.
meanings.sent1: The disinterment of the truth shocked everyone at the trial.
meanings.sent2: The disinterment of the lost manuscript was a significant discovery for historians.
meanings.sent3: The disinterment of the secret recipe solved the mystery of the missing ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The disinterment of the buried treasure was like finding a hidden gem.
meanings.sent5: The disinterment of the old diary unveiled a story of love and adventure.
